summary: A new town near Heartwood Mill.
descriptionHtml: When Idgrod Ravencrone forcefully took the throne from her sister Argi Farseer she ran away. She was running to Morrowind with a few people when she got a very severe injury on the leg because of a troll attacking her. Grosta the Heartwood Mill owner helped her and she recovered. She decided to make Heartwood Mill her home and started a new town Aspervellington and a small hold Heljimentor with the help of The Jarl of Riften. She thanked her and told her that she would be loyal to her. Now they live there in the town of Aspervellington.
author: rishukingler11
